tasks.label: debug
tasks.command:
echo -e "

To debug the node, run the following command: 
  ros2 run --prefix 'gdbserver localhost:3000' <package_name> <executable_name> 

Then, modify the executable path in .vscode/launch.json file to match the path to the built executable.
" && source /media/psf/Developer/robotics/ros_env/install/setup.bash && colcon build --symlink-install --cmake-args -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo
